answers.answer: Feeling cold all of the time is a classic symptom of hypothyroidism, but if you're urinating too often you may also have pituitary involvement, or other endocrine abnormality. Excessive urination could be anything from diabetes to a food intolerance or allergy, or even temporary bladder irritation.How long have you been having these symptoms?

question: I have syptoms of feeling very cold and needing to sleep somrtimes for just 20 mins or so always peeing and sometimes feeling like my stomach is totally empty when it shouldnt be any suggestions?
title: answer my syptoms
